task.title: How to Create an Instagram account
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to create an Instagram account.

taskbody.prereq: Download Instagram app from your phone.

context.p: Follow the next steps to create an Instagram account::

step.cmd: Open the app once it is installed on your phone.
Tap the Create New Account button. You can either use your phone number or your email address.
Enter a username and a password.
step.info: Then, fill out all your personal information. If on the other hand, you have decided to create a new profile from your Facebook account, you will have to log in first.

taskbody.result: After following these steps, you can dive into the Instagram functionalities, such as following someone.
